snippet.title: Lightyear Frontier - Multiplayer Gameplay
snippet.description:
Join Sebastian, Kelly, Anita, and Carolina as they start their new homestead on the Frontier together! Throughout the day, follow along as they help each other collect resources, put down fences and buildings, and discover the hidden secrets of the planet. https://lightyearfrontier.com/

Lightyear Frontier arrives in Early Access on PC, Xbox Series S|X, and Xbox Game Pass, Early 2024!

ALL GAMEPLAY AND ASSETS SHOWN ARE A WORK IN PROGRESS AND MAY NOT BE REFLECTED IN THE FINAL PRODUCT

Wishlist on Steam: https://bit.ly/41agxVy
Find us on Xbox: https://bit.ly/3zXOxZ9

Lightyear Frontier on Socials:
Discord: https://bit.ly/40bxgqe
Twitter: https://bit.ly/3KGkqut
TikTok: https://bit.ly/41ro6Hc
Instagram: https://bit.ly/41rOBfn
